text.tspan: Death rates from indoor air pollution vs. GDP per capita, 2015
Age-standardized death rates from air pollution attributed to the use of indoor solid fuels for cooking & heating,
measured per 100,000 individuals versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in 2011
Death rates from indoor air pollution (per 100,000)
Source: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME); World Bank - World Development Indicators
